Class: ExportOptionsGIF

ExportOptionsGIF

new ExportOptionsGIF()

Options for exporting a document as a GIF file, used with the exportFile method. All properties are optional. When you export a document, the appropriate file extension is appended automatically. You should not include any file extension in the file specification.
Source:
  • ExportOptionsGIF.js, line 6
